Table of Contents

Name

filter - spectral filters

Description

filter files are simple ASCII tables with 2 columns, representing the wavelength in Angstrom, and some transmission level (not necessarely normalized) that can be applied to a spectrum from which to computer the observed flux.

The file NEMODAT/Fnames contains an alias list of mnemonics of frequently used filters.

See Also

tabfilter(1NEMO)

Author

Peter Teuben

Files


NEMODAT/filter    data files

Update History
